metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20422 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In emulation_proc_handler of armv8_deprecated.c, there is a possible way tocorrupt memory due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalationof privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-237540956References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
